description: With all the bros already over, the after-game party is in full swing by the time Trevor Laster arrives. His buddies are all happy to see him, but one bro, Chris Knight, is particularly glad to see him. The party proceeds out to the pool while Chris makes his way to the lavatory. Trevor follows him there and they are finally united in privacy, but Chris tells Trevor he's nervous they'll get caught. Trevor isn't trying to hear Chris' excuses, telling him they can find a place on the grounds. They settle on a little used back porch as Trevor and Chris sneak in a private fuck. Chris takes the raw cock as Trevor serves it up hot and hard, fucking Chris' hole every way he desires before blasting his bro with his seed. Chris, already covered in his own nut, watches as Trevor coats him, and as they laugh and kiss, they hear voices coming, so they quickly disappear to re-emerge and blend in with the party, their secret still intact.Enjoy!
title: Spicing Up The Party
